danceFeedbackTooManyDancers: Ehtiyot bo'ling! Agar 'har 2 o'lchov' ichiga 'yangi blok yaratish'ni qo'ysangiz, siz ko'plab raqqoslarni yaratasiz.
danceFeedbackUseSetSize: Ushbu raqqosni kichikroq qilish uchun `set backup_dancer2 size` blokidan foydalaning.
danceFeedbackUseSetTint: Raqqosning rangini o'zgartirish uchun belgilangan tus blokidan foydalaning.
danceFeedbackUseStartMapping: Dasturingizga <xml><block type="Dancelab_startMapping"><title name="SPRITE">right_unicorn</title><title name="PROPERTY">"scale"</title><title name="RANGE">"bass"</title></block></xml> blokini qo'yib ko'ring.
danceFeedbackStartNewMove: To'rtinchi o'lchovdan keyin sizning raqqosangiz yangi harakat qilmadi.
danceFeedbackNeedEveryTwoMeasures: `every 2 measures` (har 2 ta o'chov) blokidan foydalanganingizga ishonch hosil qiling
danceFeedbackNeedMakeANewDancer: Ikkinchi raqqosni yaratish uchun `make a new` blokidan foydalaning.
danceFeedbackKeyEvent: Bu <xml></block><block type="Dancelab_whenKey"><title name="KEY">"up"</title></block></xml> blokiga biron bir kod qo'shganingizga ishonch hosil qiling va raqsingiz ko'rish uchun 'RUN' tugmachasini bosing.
danceFeedbackDidntPress: Raqsingiz paytida o'q tugmachalarini bosganingizga ishonch hosil qiling.
danceFeedbackPressedKey: Siz tugmachani bosdingiz, ammo raqqosingiz javob bermadi.
danceFeedbackNeedLead: Shuningdek, siz <xml><block type="Dancelab_makeAnonymousDanceSprite"><title name="COSTUME">???</title><title name="LOCATION">'{'x: 200, y: 200'}'</title></block></xml> bloki yordamida bitta sardor raqqos yaratishingiz kerak.
danceFeedbackNeedBackup: Siz <xml><block type="Dancelab_makeNewDanceSpriteGroup"><title name="N">10</title><title name="COSTUME">"UNICORN"</title><title name="LAYOUT">"circle"</title></block></xml> blocki bilan orqadagi raqqoslarni yaratishingiz kerak.
danceFeedbackSetSize: Musiqa boshlangandan so'ng siz kamida bitta raqqosning kattaligini o'zgartirishingiz kerak.
